description: An IP tracker that uses the input IP Address you provide to get the location, city and isp of the IP Address with an added functionality of its location on the map.

The event booking app simplifies event management and ticket purchasing. Users can browse events and securely book tickets. Organizers can create events, set prices, and track registrations. It provides real-time updates and enhances the event-going experience.

This application enables users to plan and organize social gatherings, meetups, or events with friends, family, or colleagues. Users can create event invitations, set dates, times, and locations, and send them to participants. The platform may also provide features like event reminders to facilitate seamless coordination and communication.
A central hub where Job seekers can explore a wide range of developer positions, filter and search based on their skills and preferences, and apply directly through the platform

A product feedback application allows users to provide valuable insights and suggestions about a product or service. Users can submit feedback, report bugs, and request new features through the platform. It also gives the users features like Roadmap Tracking to show which suggestions are being worked on or pushed live.
